Package pp_tp_er.core

Class InstitutionImpl

java.lang.Object
pp_tp_er.core.InstitutionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.estg.core.Institution
public class InstitutionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.estg.core.Institution
An implementation class that implements the provided Institution interface. The class responsible for the Institution.
Since:
Java SDK 13
See Also:
Institution

    • addAidBox

      public boolean addAidBox​(com.estg.core.AidBox aidBox) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.AidBoxException
      Adds a given AidBox to the AidBox collection of an Institution.
      Specified by:
      addAidBox in interface com.estg.core.Institution
      Parameters:
      aidBox - The given AidBox
      Returns:
      1. True, if the given AidBox was added to AidBox collection.
      2. False, if the given AidBox is equal with an existing AidBox.
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.AidBoxException -
      1. If the given AidBox is null.

    • addMeasurement

      public boolean addMeasurement​(com.estg.core.Measurement measurement, com.estg.core.Container container) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException, com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Adds a given Measurement to the Institution (considering the Aid Box and a given Container.
      Specified by:
      addMeasurement in interface com.estg.core.Institution
      Parameters:
      measurement - The given Measurement.
      container - The given Container.
      Returns:
      1. True, if the given Measurement was added to collection of Measurement.
      2. False, if the date of given Measurement is equal with the date of an existing Measurement. (Each Container has only one Measurement for a given date)
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException -
      1. If the given Container is null.
      2. If the given Container does not exist.
      com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException -
      1. If the given Measurement is null.
      2. If the value of given Measurement is less than zero.
      3. If the value of given Measurement have higher value then Container capacity

    • getContainer

      public com.estg.core.Container getContainer​(com.estg.core.AidBox aidBox, com.estg.core.ContainerType containerType) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException
      Return a copy of an existing container from an Aid Boxes and container type
      Specified by:
      getContainer in interface com.estg.core.Institution
      Parameters:
      aidBox - aidBox - Aid Box for getting measurements
      containerType - containerType - item Type for getting measurements
      Returns:
      a copy of an existing containers
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException - ContainerException - if the Aid Box doesn't exist, or if a container with the given container type doesn't exist
